title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: When searching via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are returned.
OB: The package view initializes the Search dialog with the fully qualified name. However, when searching for declarations, the fully qualified name is not found. Searching via the context menu in the packages view does work.
EB: Search in the Package view selection and dialog should correctly return results when searching for declarations.
SR:
1. Open the Package view.
2. Select a package or class from the Package view.
3. Right-click and select 'Search' from the context menu.
4. In the search dialog, ensure 'Declarations' is selected as the search scope.
5. Enter a search term for declarations and click 'Search'.
6. Verify that the search returns the appropriate results.
